email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $50.75? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star. Please confirm the laycan of 15-20 October and send over the charter party for review. Also, confirm the demurrage terms. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party shortly. Demurrage terms are $15,000 per day, pro rata, as discussed. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the charter party and everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, John
